content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in vilnius city district court the case involved a matrimonial property dispute between the applicant and the defendant the applicant requested to keep a trailer attached to a vehicle acquired during the marriage after the divorce the defendant objected but the court granted the applicants request the court also ordered the division of assets acquired during the marriage the legal text discusses the facts and grounds of the case including the dissolution of the marriage and the breakdown of the family due to conflicts and diverging views on family values the defendant failed to appear in court or file a statement of defense the court concluded that the parties were married and that there is evidence of the marriage and the acquisition of property the court also considered evidence from public registers to determine the ownership of immovable property and vehicles the court granted the applicants claim in full dissolved the marriage and awarded the applicant the vehicletrailer as personal property the defendant was ordered to pay court fees of €896
